Text:
Norton detected a Trojan on the Keygen...
Not sure about the post above me... but be cautious

After installing and running the cracks, check for a  file called lsass.exe in your Roaming profile location. That's the trojan. Use Sysinternals Process Explorer to look for processes and checking the properties. You'll start to see windows system files running in places other than C:\Windows!
Keygen's and cracks are classed as trogans  by most antivirus software

Installer seems to be clean, It's the keygen that will put lsass.exe on your machine, (confirmed w/ norton & nod32) I ran it in a pre-install environment (no HDD) separate machine, it generated working keys.

Stupid asses, surely cracks and patches are Illegal so they'll be classed as virus and trojans by some antivirus softwares... So before commenting about cracks and patches that are virus, have KNOWLEDGE of it first... NOOBS

just to clear up *pornogeek* last comment, lsass.exe (lower case L) is a very important system file. the key generator included in this torrent also inputs a sober worm on your computer. it mocks the file above, it will appear as lssas.exe or Isass.exe... in most fonts the capitol i will look like a lower case l... check ur task manager to see if u have this worm... if u do, use this to remove it... http://www.gmer.net/#files
